posts.author: Lukeseal
posts.text:
收个号 乡愁是一份沉重的爱。离开故土的游子，默默将爱收藏在心底。在异乡打拼，心里异常孤独，对着城市的钢筋水泥，对着那些永远都不可能与之说心里话的人，心中充满惆怅。在寂寞的时候，对着荷塘月色，想起故乡的袅袅炊烟，想起脸上堆满皱纹的阿爸阿妈，想起故乡的那条清澈的小河，想起儿时的玩伴，心中不由泛起甜蜜而酸涩的涟漪。
乡愁是一份深沉的爱。想起 余光中 的一首诗：小时候//乡愁是一枚小小的邮票//我在这头//母亲在那头//长大后//乡愁是一张窄窄的船票 我在这头//新娘在那头//后来啊//乡愁是一方矮矮的坟墓//我在外头//母亲啊在里头//而现在//乡愁是一湾浅浅的海峡收个号//我在这头//大陆在那头。乡愁，承载着游子多少牵挂，多少痴缠的情感，多少浓烈的爱意，多少望穿秋水的期盼。
对母亲的牵挂，是乡愁中最浓烈的爱。想起母亲年轻时那乌黑的长发，发中飘散着游子熟悉的发香。小时候，游子时常依偎在母亲的怀中，听母亲讲河神的故事。对游子来说，母亲就是那条小河，有着清澈的眼睛，有着丰盈的乳汁，有着对自己细水长流爱。母爱如水，他如河旁的 小草 。从小到大，那条母亲河源源不断地滋润着他，陪伴他成长。
对 父亲 的牵挂，是乡愁中最深沉的爱。父亲，往往不苟言笑。在游子眼中，看得最多的往往是父亲伟岸的背影。父亲的背影，像山一样高大挺拔。小时候，常常趴在父亲的背上，感受父亲背上的温暖。父爱如山，他默默的守护着母亲，守护着游子，守护着这个暖意融融的家。父亲的背影，永远铭刻在游子的心里，无论岁月怎么侵蚀他的记忆，那熟悉的背影永远刻骨铭心。
对爷爷的牵挂，是乡愁中最和蔼可亲的爱。除了父母，爷爷便是占据游子记忆的亲人。爷爷满头白发，皱纹堆满了额头，总是抽着水烟，抽烟时发出“吧嗒”“吧嗒”的响声。爷爷经常在河边钓鱼，游子总是坐在爷爷身边，看爷爷聚精会神的等鱼上钩。最开心的，莫过于爷爷钓了一大篮子的鱼，这些小鱼便是游子最丰盛的晚餐
蹨

thread.section_title: Riprendiamoci Roma
thread.title: "Roma: il mio sogno, la mia méta!"
thread.title_full: "Roma: il mio sogno, la mia méta!"

posts.author: Riprendiamoci Roma (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: "Roma: il mio sogno, la mia méta!"
posts.text:
Riceviamo e pubblichiamo la meravigliosa lettera di un attivissimo cittadino segnalatore. Davvero grazie! RR 
"Roma: il mio sogno, la mia meta!" 

Dopo aver usato molto del mio tempo a documentare con foto, video, “editoriali”, ho deciso di fermarmi un attimo. 
Così, per riflettere. 
Non è facile farlo quando si vive in maniera convulsa e le proprie giornate diventano maratone sempre più lunghe ed estenuanti. 
Oggi, dopo l’ultimo “rapporto” sul degrado di Roma e sulle menzogne di un’amministrazione capitolina del tutto incompetente, ho deciso di farlo. 
Semplicemente perché mentre filmavo l’agonia della nostra città dopo un violento temporale, mi è ronzata in testa una domanda: dove ci porterà tutto questo? 
Già, mi chiedo, c’è un luogo, una méta, alla fine di questa lunga strada lastricata di centinaia, migliaia di testimonianze di disagio da parte di tutti noi, delusi e arrabbiati, verso la quale indirizzare tutti i nostri sforzi e dalla quale ripartire verso quel futuro che sognamo e che sembra, ormai, davvero irrealizzabile? 
Io ho tentato oggi di rispondere a questa domanda, ma non ho trovato una risposta. Anzi, ho creduto di non trovarla. Finchè non mi sono fermato ad osservare una scena mentre fotografavo l’allagamento di piazza Bologna dopo il nubrifagio di oggi. 
Un bambino, di fronte a me, dall’altra parte della strada. E’ fermo al semaforo pedonale in attesa del segnale verde. Non avrà più di 12 anni. E’ impaziente, sembra avere fretta. Non so per quale motivo attragga tanto la mia attenzione. Forse perché saltella ed in quel momento è l’unico movimento degno di nota della piazza. Non passano automobili, non c’è anima viva. Scatta il verde e scatta anche il bambino, ma dopo il primo balzo in avanti è costretto a fermarsi. E’ tutto allagato, non può proseguire a meno di entrare nel lago che si è formato a causa delle caditoie ostruite e mai pulite. L’acqua sarà alta almeno 20 centimetri. Lo so perché l’ho appena fotografata. L’ennesima testimonianza da usare più tardi contro l’immobilismo di chi ci governa o ha la presunzione di farlo senza averne la competenza. 
Il bambino si guarda intorno. Non sa cosa fare. Un’auto sopraggiunge e si ferma, poi ne arriva un’altra e fa la stessa cosa. Il bambino si guarda intorno e prende ovviamente la decisione di aggirare il lago. Per fare questo deve necessariamente abbandonare le strisce pedonali. Saettando tra le auto che nel frattempo sono giunte, compie un ampio cerchio e con un salto supera la barriera d’acqua sotto la quale è il marciapiede opposto. E’ salvo, penso. Per un attimo mi guarda. Devo essere davvero buffo. Ho l’ombrello chiuso sotto l’ascella sinistra, il cellulare nella mano destra e parlo sottovoce mentre registro il filmato. Ma non sono solo. Non mi sono accorto che accanto a me c’è un vecchio con la barba grigia. Ero troppo assorto, non mi sono reso conto della sua presenza. Anche lui mi guarda in silenzio. Mi sento un po’ in imbarazzo. 
Quando filmo cerco sempre di trovare un momento in cui sono solo. Raramente, però,  ci riesco. Non mi piace essere osservato in quei momenti. Mi volto verso il vecchio e lui automaticamente si volta verso il bambino. Poi allarga le braccia come a dire “ questo è matto, non farci caso ”. Il bambino gli sorride e risponde con un cenno della testa che io interpreto come un “ ho capito, stai tranquillo ”. Poi il bambino ingrana la marcia e scompare in un istante dalla mia visuale mentre il vecchio si incammina nella direzione opposta bofonchiando parole incomprensibili. 
Un bambino e un vecchio. E io. 
Sono rimasto solo davanti a quel semaforo, in mezzo all’acqua. Avevo le scarpe zuppe, l’ombrello rotto tra costole e braccio, il cellulare ben stretto in mano e una domanda che mi frullava nella testa: dove diavolo stiamo andando? 
Agli occhi di un vecchio sono un matto, a quelli di un bambino sono qualcuno di cui ridere. Spesso mi avete guardato con quegli stessi occhi. Nonostante i miei sforzi per essere solo durante i miei “reportage”, in realtà c’è sempre stato qualcuno che mi ha osservato con curiosità, a volte quasi con rimprovero, a volte con diffidenza, altre con un misto di compassione e derisione. E  allora ho deciso di scrivervi. Sì, queste poche righe sono per voi. Perché voi siete la risposta alla mia domanda se ci sia un luogo, una méta. Voi che scrivete sui social, voi che subite l’inganno di chi muove le fila, voi che sognate senza avere, e anche voi, che mi compatite o che mi deridete. Voi siete la méta, quella méta. Voi siete Roma e Roma è voi, tutti noi. 
I vostri occhi, le vostre espressioni, i vostri sentimenti, sono gli stessi che ho percepito dalle sue pietre, dal suo intricato tessuto di storia, arte, quotidianità e le sue ferite sono le vostre ferite, la sua impotenza è la vostra impotenza, il suo giocarsi di me è il vostro giocarvi di me. 
Io, forse, sono matto perché amo Roma più di me stesso. 
Roma è un malato terminale, verissimo, ma non per questo va abbandonata, ignorata. Perché il miracolo è sempre possibile, fino a un istante prima dell’ultimo respiro. E’ una cosa, questa, che mi ha insegnato la vita, in tante occasioni. 
Dobbiamo avere noi stessi come traguardo, noi che siamo la città, dobbiamo ritrovarci, lottare insieme, consolarci e aiutarci. 
Io ho deciso, dopo molto vagare, di seguire Riprendiamoci Roma. 
Credo che sia uno strumento eccellente attraverso il quale intraprendere il percorso verso un punto lontano che non sia solo di arrivo, ma anche e soprattutto di partenza. 
Quel punto, per me ha un nome: Roma. 
E’ e sarà il mio sogno, la mia méta e, spero, anche la vostra. Ora, grazie a un vecchio, a un bambino e a un nubifragio, l’ho capito. Tutto il resto, come dice la nota canzone, è solo ed esclusivamente noia…. 
 Lettera firmata

바람직하게 할부하는 방법입니다.
[폭스바겐] 더 뉴 파사트 2.5중고차 를 구입하는 가장 좋은 시기는 언제 일까요?
중고차를 구입하는 가장 좋은 시기는
구매자의 마음에 드는 매물 이 나왔을 때 라고 생각됩니다.
구매자가 원하는 매물을 중고차시장에서 발견하고
자금이 준비가 되면 해당 시기가 가장 구매에 좋을 시기일 것입니다.
하지만 중고차 구매를 계획하고 있다면 차량을 알아보는 시기와
실제 구매시기를 잘 조율하는것이 현명하게 중고차를 구매하는 방법 입니다.
질리지않는 다크그레이 이 매력적인
이차량은 2013년식 으로 정말 좋은 매물입니다!
깔끔하고 상태좋은 위 차량은 정말 메리트있습니다.
[폭스바겐] 더 뉴 파사트 2.5중고차 를 구입하는 가장 좋은 시기는 언제 일까요?

실제 구매시기를 잘 조율하는것이 현명하게 중고차를 구매하는 방법 입니다.
건전한 중고차 시장 활성화 및 독보적인 중고차 브랜드를 구축 하기 위해서
저희 체크카즈 는 노력 하고 있습니다.
순수 매입한 100% 실매물 중고차만 취급하며
자체 광고 및 주차장과 같은 부대시설 이용료, 제휴 업체를 통한 상품화 과정 등등
유통 마진을 최소한 으로 줄이기 때문에 차량금액이 저렴해집니다.
저희 체크카즈 의 가치를 훼손하지 않고 사람과의 관계를 중요시하여
길게 오래 볼 것을 약속합니다 .
본 [폭스바겐] 더 뉴 파사트 2.5은
정상적인 차량으로 차량대금 + 이전비 + 보험비 + 여윳돈 까지
보증인 없이 전액 할부 가능합니다.

2013년식 실매물로 사고내역 없이 깨끗하니
마음에 드신다면 얼른 찜콩~ 연락주세요^0^

문의시 차량번호를 미리 말씀해 주시면 원활한 상담이 가능합니다.
꼭 차량번호 " 49무7714"를 기억후 말씀해주세요.

thread.title_full: Александр ЗИНЧЕНКО: "Дебютная игра за "Ман Сити"? Это не моя позиция, но победителей не судят"

posts.title: Александр ЗИНЧЕНКО: "Дебютная игра за "Ман Сити"? Это не моя позиция, но победителей не судят"
posts.text:
Украина Англия Александр ЗИНЧЕНКО: "Дебютная игра за "Ман Сити"? Это не моя позиция, но победителей не судят" 
Полузащитник " Манчестер Сити " Александр Зинченко , который в октябре дебютировал за первую команду "горожан", довольно сдержанно оценивает свою игру в матче Кубка английской лиги против " Вулверхэмптона ". 

- Безусловно, у меня было много ошибок, потому что без этого никуда. Я долгое время не играл. Более того, это были первые 120 минут в моей футбольной карьере (" Ман Сити " одолел оппонента лишь в серии пенальти - прим.авт.). Даже по детям не играл. Это была немного не моя позиция, но команда выиграла. Было сложно. Тем не менее, победителей не судят, - подчеркнул Зинченко в интервью телеканалу " Футбол 1".

thread.title: Tweeter-in-chief ready to confront China's 'great firewall'
thread.title_full: Tweeter-in-chief ready to confront China's 'great firewall' - Times Union

posts.author: timesunion.com
posts.title: Tweeter-in-chief ready to confront China's 'great firewall'
posts.text:
Photo: Jung Yeon-Je,   U.S. President Donald Trump, left, and South Korean President Moon Jae-In shake hands during a joint press conference at the presidential Blue House in Seoul, South Korea, Tuesday, Nov. 7, 2017. (Jung Yeon-Je/Pool Photo via AP) less U.S. President Donald Trump, left, and South Korean President Moon Jae-In shake hands during a joint press conference at the presidential Blue House in Seoul, South Korea, Tuesday, Nov. 7, 2017. (Jung ... more Photo: Jung Yeon-Je, AP Tweeter-in-chief ready to confront China's 'great firewall'   WASHINGTON (AP) — America's tweeter-in-chief is set to face off bit-to-bit against China's "great firewall."
President Donald Trump's arrival in Beijing on Wednesday will serve as a test of reach for his preferred 140-character communications tool.
The White House is declining to comment on the president's ability to tweet in China or the precautions being taken to protect his communications in the heavily monitored state. It's about more than cybersecurity. Knowing the president's penchant for showmanship, some aides are trying to build up social media suspense before Air Force One is wheels-down in Beijing.
Spoiler alert: The American president will get his way. Multiple officials familiar with the procedures in place but unauthorized to discuss them publicly said the president will, in fact, be able to tweet in China.
Twitter is blocked for domestic users in China, but foreigners have had success accessing the social media service while using data roaming services that connect to their home cellular networks.
For an American president, it's not that straightforward. Securing the president's communications — and tweets — in China requires satellites, sophisticated electronics and the work of hundreds on multiple continents.
Trump, like his predecessor, has a secure cell phone, though he uses it more for tweeting than phone calls. He's sent at least two dozen tweets in the first four days of his trip to Asia. Developed in collaboration between the National Security Agency and Secret Service, it has some regular functionality disabled to protect from hacking. But China poses a distinct challenge: Merely turning it on there is a security risk, as China's cellular network is believed to be entirely compromised by its security services.
Several former administration officials said they did not recall whether President Barack Obama brought his cell phone to China. The White House declined to say whether Trump would be bringing his phone on the trip, but tweets sent by him since he's departed Washington are marked as being sent from an iPhone.
Chinese officials appeared to recognize the importance of the medium to their guest. Asked whether Trump would be able to tweet from Beijing, Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Zheng Zeguang told reporters on Friday: "We take everything into account on receiving foreign heads of state so you should have no reservations about Mr. President's ability to keep in touch with the outside."
But officials said it would hardly be up to China, as it would be inconceivable for Trump's device to ever reach a Chinese network.
The White House maintains an ever-updating set of policies and regulations for overseas travel. According to current and former White House staffers, officials are sometimes issued new devices specifically for foreign trips. Their phone numbers and emails are forwarded to the new devices for the duration of the overseas stint, then shifted back to their stateside devices once they return. The phones used on the trip are returned to the White House IT office for inspection.
In the event the trip is to a high-risk cyber-espionage location, such as China, Israel or Cuba, aides are given extensive briefings on cybersecurity. Among the precautions: Aides are strongly discouraged from turning on their devices in the offending country.
Former White House press secretary Josh Earnest recalled that security protocols changed frequently during the Obama administration, but that aides were encouraged to leave their personal devices on Air Force One.
"While in the country, we were encouraged to bring everything with us whenever we left the room, even for short periods" such as a gym visit, Earnest said. "And, we were told never to use hotel provided Wi-Fi."
But, Earnest added, it "seems reasonable that these safeguards are easy to put in place for Trump's phone."
The White House Communications Agency, a 1,200-person military command, is responsible for the president's global communications needs. The primary role is to maintain communications for critical defense purposes, like emergency communications with military commanders. In every presidential motorcade, for instance, an armored SUV codenamed Road Runner provides for a connection to an array of military and Secret Service communications networks. Abroad, it also enables mundane presidential traffic, like tweets.
On a trip, the WHCA, along with the White House situation room staff, maintains a secure communications suite at the presidential hotel for use by presidential staff. It includes both secure and unsecured phones, as well as access to the White House Wi-Fi network. It is swept routinely for spying devices and guarded 24/7. Overseas, "we'd have to be extra vigilant about confining classified — and even personal — discussions to this suite," recalled Ned Price, a former CIA analyst who worked as a spokesman for Obama's National Security Council.
___
Associated Press writer Christopher Bodeen in Beijing contributed to this report.
___
Follow Zeke Miller on Twitter at http://twitter.com/@ZekeJMiller .

posts.text:
Hi Ally,
I'm having YAG laser tomorrow morning for PCO that happened rather soon in my left eye (five months out of surgery). It is supposed to help with some blurriness I've been experiencing in that eye, but doc said nothing about the halos and starbursts, which he still says I need to be patient with. Night driving is becoming tolerable, but it's more that I've gotten used to the new normal of starbursts and halos; I am hoping that his word is correct and that these issues will eventually subside.

posts.author: Ally321
posts.text:
Thank you Sue,
ill report what my surgeon says tomorrow. I totally trust her as she is one of the leading cornea specialists in the country, affiliation with a major NYC teaching hospital. and did a fantastic job with my cornea surgery 6 years ago. I know she explained that this PCO can develop at any time, and a laser tweak will improve my reading. It was her Fellow that brought up the scar tissue issue. But whatever, I can’t even imagine having a lens exchange. I found this surgery to be very stressful, I don’t like anyone messing with my eyes. I watched my Dad go blind from improper eye treatments. Boy, it’s a good thing I have insurance, just got the bill from the first eye, $19,000 without the lens that was out of pocket.
jerome good luck tomorrow and thanks for the night driving encouragement

thread.section_title: Наука - Популярная механика
thread.title: Комета 96P вернулась в новом обличье
thread.title_full: Комета 96P вернулась в новом обличье

posts.title: Комета 96P вернулась в новом обличье
posts.text:
Нравится 0 
Совместную миссию NASA и ESA по изучению Солнца SOHO (Solar and Heliospheric Observatory) навестил старый знакомец — комета 96P, вошедшая в поле видимости телескопа 25 октября этого года. 
Комету 96P наблюдали в 1996, 2002, 2007 и 2012 годах; это самый часто регистрируемый миссией SOHO транзитный объект. В этом году ее зарегистрировал и другой аппарат — миссия NASA STEREO (Solar and Terrestrial Relations Observatory). STEREO наблюдала комету с другого ракурса. Наблюдать комету одновременно из двух далеких друг от друга точек удается крайне редко, случай с 96P — уникальный; когда результаты наблюдений двух обсерваторий объединят, ученые получат самое детальное изображение кометы из когда-либо полученных — а также данные о ее взаимодействии с солнечным ветром. 
Обе миссии измерили поляризацию света, отраженного веществом хвоста кометы. Эти измерения с двух точек позволят сделать выводы о составе этого вещества и размерах частиц, составляющих хвост кометы. Наука

posts.title: Crédit Agricole to buy Banca Leonardo
posts.text: Acquisition A wealth manager in Italy Crédit Agricole to buy Banca Leonardo Staff Writer | Tuesday November 7, 2017 | 11 minutes ago Indosuez Wealth Management, the global wealth management brand of Crédit Agricole Group, announces that its subsidiary CA Indosuez Wealth (Europe) has signed an agreement with GBH, Exor, Eurazeo, Swilux, and Torreal, the main shareholders of Banca Leonardo, to acquire 67.67% of Banca Leonardo, a wealth manager in Italy. CA Indosuez Wealth (Europe) will offer the other shareholders of Banca Leonardo to purchase their shares at the same price and conditions, so that CA Indosuez Wealth (Europe) may ultimately own up to 100% of Banca Leonardo. Article continues below Accquiring Banca Leonardo will allow Indosuez Wealth Management to further enhance its existing wealth management capabilities and offering in the Italian market, adding 5.9 billion euros (as of June 30. 2017) in assets under management (AuM). The acquisition will bring a client portfolio predominantly composed of High Net Worth Individuals (HNWIs). The combined business will provide added-value services to new and existing HNWI clients, as well as support to Crédit Agricole Italia through active cooperation, enhancing client satisfaction and profitability. The deal is fully in line with Crédit Agricole Group’s Medium-Term Plan “Strategic Ambition 2020.” ■ What to read next

thread.title: Szereted az animációt? Akkor itt a helyed!
thread.title_full: Szereted az animációt? Akkor itt a helyed!

posts.author: Kultúrpart
posts.title: Szereted az animációt? Akkor itt a helyed!
posts.text:
további bejegyzések a szerzőtől » 
Önkénteseket keresnek a november 29 és december 3 között megrendezésre kerülő Anilogue filmvesztiválra. 
Ha szereted a filmeket, különösen az animációt, és van néhány nap szabadidőd november végén/december elején, amit szívesen töltenél egy remek csapat tagjaként, és még arra is kíváncsi vagy, hogy működik egy filmfesztivál belülről, akkor TÉGED keresünk! 
Jelentkezésed a e-mail címre várják, Kókai-Nagy Tímeának címezve! Mindenképp írd meg a jelentkezésedkor, hogy:- milyen nyelv(ek)en beszélsz,- melyik feladatot vállalnád legszívesebben (a feladatkörök felsorolását lejjebb találod - lehetőleg több feladatot is jelölj meg),- a fesztivál ideje alatt (november 29. – december 3.) mely napokon és estéken érsz rá,- és a fesztivált megelőző egy hétben mikor tudsz részt venni az előkészületekben. 
Ezen feladatkörök várnak Rád: 
Anilogisztikus (gyakorlat): a filmeket/tárgyakat nagyon gyorsan mozgatod A-ból B-be. Anilogisztikus (elméleti): a dolgok és személyek mozgását figyeled a helyszínek között, és meg tudod mondani, hogy mi és ki hol van, ki tud róla, és hol kellene lennie, ha valamiért eltévedt. Infopultos: mindent részletet tudsz a fesztiválról, a filmekről, a vetítésekről, segítesz az újságíróknak és a szakmai vendégeknek az eligazodásban, és a fesztivál minden stábtagját bármikor elő tudod keríteni Házigazda: arról gondoskodsz, hogy a fesztivál vendégei ne tévedjenek el a városban, ne késsék le a saját vetítésüket, ne maradjanak éhen, ne unatkozzanak. A nyelvtudás itt különösen fontos: idén például biztosan lesznek finn, német, argentin, amerikai és francia vendégeink. Fesztiválhíradós: a fesztivál eseményeit örökíted meg fényképezőgép és/vagy videokamera segítségével. Plakátfelelős: a fesztivál előtti időszakban Budapest fontos helyszíneire eljuttatod a plakátjaikat, hogy az egész város értesüljön az Anilogue-ról 
További feladatok, amelyek nem igényelnek magyarázatot: fordító, tolmács, moderátor, idegenvezető, bemondó, sofőr, dekorátor, workshop asszisztens, jegyszedő, tolmácsgéposztó . 
+1 a legbátrabbaknak: Fesztiváltűzoltó: a fentiek mind, plusz az előreláthatatlan események kezelése. 
Segítségedet azzal tudják honorálni, hogy részt vehetsz a fesztivál vetítésein. 
Jelentkezésed november 10 - ig várják, a részleteket pedig a fesztivált megelőző héten, egy stábülésen pontosítjátok, amelynek időpontjáról és helyszínéről külön értesítenek!

thread.title: Cut down on court delays by supporting victims of crime: ombudsman
thread.title_full: Cut down on court delays by supporting victims of crime: ombudsman

posts.author: News Staff
posts.title: Cut down on court delays by supporting victims of crime: ombudsman
posts.text:
by Joanna Smith, The Canadian Press  00 am EST Last Updated Nov 7, 2017 at 4:40 am EST 
OTTAWA – Making sure those who experience the biggest impacts of crime have the support they need would do a lot to speed up the wheels of justice, says the federal ombudsman for victims of crime. 
“We have to have a criminal justice system that is effective and efficient,” Sue O’Sullivan said in an interview ahead of today’s release of a set of reports on how the Liberal government could keep victims in mind as they prepare to introduce reforms. 
“Let’s look for a system that is going to meet the needs of victims instead of looking for alternatives when the system isn’t working.” 
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau gave Justice Minister Jody Wilson-Raybould the mandate to review changes to the criminal justice system and sentencing reforms the previous Conservative government brought in as part of its tough-on-crime agenda, including mandatory minimum penalties. 
The need to improve the criminal justice system has been given an increased sense of urgency since last summer, when the Supreme Court released its groundbreaking ruling, R v. Jordan, that came down hard on serious delays that can mean years pass by between the laying of charges and the conclusion of a trial. 
The top court imposed strict new ceilings on the amount of time a case could take to make its way through the system — 18 months in provincial courts and 30 months in superior courts. The only remedy for going over the limit is a stay of proceedings, no matter how serious the charge. 
The impact that court delays — and having cases tossed as a result — can have on victims of crime was one of the issues that came up over the summer as O’Sullivan held cross-country consultations to gather perspectives from victims and advocacy groups on criminal justice reforms. 
“Court delays are typically cast in terms of the rights of the accused but not the rights of victims,” said one of the five reports to be released today. 
“Yet victims also have an important interest in a criminal justice system that is not delayed,” the report said. “Having charges stayed as a result of delays hurts victims. Remedies that emphasize both the rights of the accused and the rights of the victim must be found.” 
In an interview, O’Sullivan argued that giving victims of crime the resources and information they need can cut down on judicial delays. 
She pointed to a pilot program in England and Wales that boosted support for victims and witnesses, including with basic needs such as child care, addressed concerns such as fear of intimidation and provided them with greater communication throughout the process. 
“There was an increase in the number of victims and witnesses that could testify,” she said. “There was an increase in early guilty pleas.” 
O’Sullivan said those who took part in her engagement process understood systemic root causes of crime often blur the line between victim and perpetrator, but they would like to see a greater balance between their rights and the rights of the accused. 
“They want to make sure that the legs of the stool are equal,” she said. 
One of the reports focused on bail reform, including the Liberal campaign promise to create a reverse onus on bail for those who have previously been convicted of intimate partner violence. A commitment to toughen bail conditions in domestic assault cases was also in the mandate letter. 
The report urges the federal government to act on this, but also recommends ensuring victims are considered in all aspects of bail reform, such as by requiring judges to ask whether a victim has been consulted about their safety and security needs as they decide whether to grant bail. 
The mandate letter for Wilson-Raybould said sentencing reform should result in greater use of restorative justice. 
Many of those who participated in the consultations expressed apprehension over this, including the concern it could be a way to reduce penalties, or avoid them altogether. 
There were also concerns about restorative justice being used for gender-based violence, given the power imbalance these cases can involve. 
O’Sullivan said the key is that victims should have a say. 
“I think what we have to do is ask victims,” said O’Sullivan. 
A common theme throughout the reports is that victims need stronger and better enforced rights, but also more information about what those rights are in the first place. 
O’Sullivan said could be helped by involving everyone in the justice system, from police officers to the federal government, in doing more to create awareness of the Canadian Victims Bill of Rights. 
The federal justice minister said in a statement Monday that she has included victims groups in her consultations on criminal justice system reform, including a roundtable devoted to these issues. 
“The minister remains committed to fulfilling all aspects of her mandate letter, including toughening bail conditions in cases domestic assault,” her office said in a statement. 
— Follow @smithjoanna on Twitter

thread.title: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown
thread.title_full: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown

posts.author: Andrew Taylor
posts.title: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown
posts.text:
Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown By Andrew Taylor ,   7th, 2017 @ 2:21am  1 photo  
WASHINGTON (AP) — An early December government shutdown is a real possibility, since a divided Congress can't agree on military spending, Democrats insist on help for young immigrants and President Donald Trump's position can change with each lawmaker he talks to. 
Most of Washington is focused on overhauling the nation's tax code, but lawmakers face a combustible mix of must-do and could-do items, with the current government spending bill set to expire Dec. 8. On the list are immigration and a U.S.-Mexico border wall; an impasse over children's health care; pent-up demand for budget increases for the Pentagon and domestic agencies; and tens of billions of dollars in hurricane aid. 
There's plenty at stake for Republicans controlling Washington. Politically, there's an urgency to avoid a debilitating shutdown just as the GOP hopes to wrap up an overhaul of the tax code that is its top priority. And legions of GOP defense hawks are adamant that the Pentagon receive a huge 2018 budget hike approaching $80-90 billion. Trump and many followers want the U.S.-Mexico wall. 
Democrats retain considerable power in the endgame — their votes are needed — and are pressing demands of their own. They want protections for immigrants who were brought to the U.S. illegally as young children. They also demand budget increases for domestic agencies. 
"I think we're headed in a good direction on the spending caps," Sen. Roy Blunt, R-Mo., said Monday. "I don't know that will get to immigration this year but that's a pretty easy thing to settle if the Democrats will give the president some of what he wants. I think he would be willing to be pretty forward-leaning on kids who were brought to the country illegally." 
For his part, Trump tends to waver depending on the situation — siding with Democrats on a debt deal in September, and promising Republicans last week that the controversial immigration issue won't be part of the year-end spending measure. 
Meanwhile, the tax debate is taking up energy, time and political capital, and GOP leaders seem reluctant to issue controversial decisions that might harm its chances. 
A rundown of non-tax issues facing Congress and Trump: 
___ 
SPENDING 
Ideally, top leaders in both parties would like to agree on new spending levels and pass a catchall bill by the Dec. 8 deadline. That's looking increasingly unlikely. Another temporary funding bill would be needed to avert a government shutdown, but many Democrats say they won't be able to support any measure that doesn't include help for so-called "Dreamer" immigrants facing deportation. That increases the odds of a shutdown. 
Congressional leaders are conducting secret talks on raising the spending levels and say they are optimistic about a deal. But there's no sign of one yet. A possible agreement could add perhaps $100 billion to the budget for the current year alone, which is sure to cause sticker shock among the GOP's fiscal conservatives. Trump's demands for the border wall — a nonstarter with Democrats — could spark a shutdown battle. 
Then there's aid to areas devastated by Hurricanes Harvey, Irma and Maria. The White House promises to submit a request later this month for "several tens of billions of dollars" aimed mostly at helping Texas and Florida. That's likely to bring the total appropriated since September for hurricane relief to more than $100 billion, which is likely to rankle deficit hawks. 
___ 
IMMIGRATION 
Trump announced in September that he is ending temporary deportation protections granted by the Obama administration to young immigrants known as "Dreamers" who were illegally brought into the U.S. and often have known no other home. But he gave Congress until March to come up with a fix and promised top Democratic leaders he would sign legislation protecting them, so long as he wins billions for border security. 
The Congressional Hispanic Caucus and Senate Democrats, such as California Sen. Kamala Harris, are demanding the immigration issue be addressed as soon as possible and won't vote for any spending bill that fails to include a solution. That could doom the spending bill as Republicans need Democratic votes to pass the measure. Top Democrats such as Minority Leader Chuck Schumer of New York are keeping their powder dry in hopes that negotiations, which presently appear stalled, pick up steam. 
___ 
CHILDREN'S HEALTH 
The reauthorization of an expired children's health program is becoming more urgent as the lapse in the program will mean a cutoff in services in Arizona, California, Minnesota, Ohio and other states by late December or January. 
There's a bipartisan desire to extend the program, but negotiations over how to pay for the measure have yet to produce a breakthrough. A compromise ultimately appears likely, and the measure is a candidate to be coupled with other items in December. 
___ 
DEFENSE 
House and Senate negotiators are putting the final touches on an annual defense policy bill for the 2018 fiscal year that's expected to increase the Pentagon's core budget by billions of dollars more than the $603 billion Trump requested. 
There's some urgency to the talks since Senate Armed Services Chairman John McCain, R-Ariz., is battling an aggressive form of brain cancer. 
The defense policy bill is expected to expand U.S. missile defenses in response to North Korea's advancing nuclear weapons programs. Lawmakers also are trying to resolve a long simmering debate over the creation of a new branch that would be in charge of the U.S. military's space assets. 
  Photos

posts.author: wattan1011
posts.text:
レベルが高い美術・芸術大学卒でなければ、難しいと思います。
コミュニケーション障がいですが、程度によります。
治らないから障害であり、相手の発言の意図が分からない場合は、教師には向いていないので、違う道を目指したほうが良いと思います。
高校で美術の予備校に通い、レベルが高い美術の大学に進学することを目指すことだと思いますが、一般の大学よりかなり費用がかかります。
海外留学などを経験する必要があるかもしれません（お金がかかる）。
専門校ではなく、トップレベルの進学高校に進み、レベルが高い大学に進学することを目指すことです。
コミュニケーション能力、基礎学力、美術の能力（日本トップレベルでなくても良い）の３点が揃っていないと、教員になることは難しいと思います。

posts.author: WIN WIN DEMOCRACY (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: គ្រួសារសពកីឡាករអុំទូកក្តាមប្រៃ បានទទួលថវិកា១លានរៀល ពីលោកឧបនាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី គង់ សំអុល
posts.text:
កំពង់ឆ្នាំង៖ លោក សៀត គឹមលៀង អភិបាលរងខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង រួមដំណើរដោយសហការី កាលពីរសៀលថ្ងៃទី៥ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០១៧ បានចុះសាកសួរសុខទុក្ខ និងនាំយកថវិការបស់លោកឧបនាយករដ្ឋមន្រ្តី គង់ សំអុល រដ្ឋមន្រ្តីព្រះបរមរាជវាំង និងជាប្រធានក្រុមការងារថ្នាក់កណ្តាល ចុះជួយខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង ចំនួន១លានរៀល ជូនដល់គ្រួសារសពកីឡាករអុំទូកក្តាមប្រៃ ឈ្មោះ ចាប សាភួន ដល់លំនៅដ្ឋានស្ថិតក្នុងភូមិកំពង់ក្តា ឃុំកំពង់ត្រឡាច ស្រុកំពង់ត្រឡាច ខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង។

មានប្រសាសន៍ក្នុងឱកាសនោះលោក សៀត គឹមលៀង បានពាំនាំប្រសាសន៍ផ្តាំផ្ញើសាកសួរសុខទុក្ខ និងចូលរួមមរណទុក្ខជាមួយក្រុមគ្រួសារសព ពីលោកឧបនាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី គង់ សំអុល ដែលកន្លងមក តែងតែគិតគូរពីសុខទុក្ខប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលជួបការលំបាក និងរងគ្រោះដោយករណីផ្សេងៗ មិនប្រកាន់ពូជសាសន៍ និងនិន្នាការនយោបាយឡើយ។

ជាមួយគ្នានោះដែរ លោកអភិបាលរងខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង ក៏បានផ្តាំផ្ញើឲ្យក្រុមគ្រួសារខិតខំថែទាំសុខភាព និងធ្វើយ៉ាងណាអប់រំកូនឲ្យចៀសឆ្ងាយពីគ្រឿងញៀន និងបញ្ជូនកូនទៅសាលារៀនអោយបានគ្រប់គ្នាៗ។

នាឱកាសនោះ តំណាងឲ្យក្រុមគ្រួសារសព ក៏បានថ្លែងអំណរគុណដល់ លោកឧបនាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី គង់ សំអុល និងលោក សៀត គឹមលៀង ព្រមទាំងសហការី និងជូនពរឱ្យសូមមានសុខភាពល្អ និងទទួលបានជ័យជំនៈគ្រប់ភារកិច្ចផងដែរ៕

[6] Клингерит - специальный эластичный материал, изготовляемый в виде листов и служащий для прокладок. [8] Паронит ( клингерит) представляет собой прессованные листы из асбеста, резины и разных наполнителей. Паронит изготовляется следующих марок в зависимости от рабочих условий. [9] В качестве уплотняющего материала служит клингерит - материал, изготовляемый из асбестового волокна и различных связующих веществ. [11] Хомут устанавливается на прокладке из клингерита, листового свинца или листовой резины. Прокладка должна иметь толщину 2 - 3 мм, ширину, равную ширине жолоба на хомуте, и длину такую, чтобы она перекрывала дефектное место с каждой стороны на 50 - 60 мм. [12] Рамки электродиализных ванн изготовляют из клингерита, паронита, резины, полиэтилена, поливинилхлорида или других неэлектролровЬдных и негигроскопичных материалов. Материал рамки должен быть достаточно эластичным, чтобы обеспечивать хорошее уплотнение по плоскостям прилегания рамки к мембране и в то же время он не должен течь и выжиматься из ванны при ее стягивании. [13] Устанавливают запасную прокладку ( из клингерита, паранита) и прижимают ее буртиком трубки, туго завернув поджимную гайку. [14] В качестве прокладок используются картон, клингерит, бумага, резина, свинец, красная медь, латунь и пр. [15]

posts.author: ΝΙΚΟΛΑΟΣ ΒΛΑΧΟΣ (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Ένας δρόμος …
posts.text:
Δρομολογείται μαθαίνουμε η κατασκευή ενός δρόμου που θα ενώσει το Σίσι με τους οικοδομικούς συνεταιρισμούς του ΟΤΕ και των Εμπόρων Ηρακλείου στην περιοχή της Μιλάτου.
Ένας δρόμος που αν έχουμε καταλάβει καλά, θα εξυπηρετήσει και το παρακείμενο ξενοδοχείο της περιοχής του Μίνωα Γενειατάκη. Με τη σύμφωνη γνώμη του Περιφερειάρχη, ο οποίος έχει συμφωνήσει να δοθούν μέχρι 500.000 € για τη διάνοιξη και ασφαλτόστρωση του δρόμου, αλλά και του Δήμου Αγίου Νικολάου που ετοιμάζεται να αναθέσει τη σχετική μελέτη, εφόσον βρεθούν τα σχετικά χρήματα... Μαθαίνουμε όμως ότι και η  βούληση της Τοπικής Δημοτικής Κοινότητας  Βραχασίου, πρόσφατα,  είναι θετική,  αφού λέγεται ότι έχει πάρει και σχετική απόφαση για το θέμα. Ο παραλιακός δρόμος που μένει εδώ και πολλά χρόνια μισοτελειωμένος. Ο δρόμος αυτός δεν ακολουθεί την χάραξη του παραλιακού που έχει διανοιχθεί εδώ και πολλά χρόνια αλλά αποτελεί μια νέα χάραξη πιο εσωτερικά…
Είναι ένας δρόμος που δημιουργεί νέες εξελίξεις στην περιοχή...
Συνδέεται άραγε η πρόσφατη παραίτηση της συμβούλου κ. Κ. Αστρουλάκη ( ΕΔΩ ) με τις εξελίξεις αυτές;

posts.author: 西延人二
posts.title: 一次轻松的跨省之旅——徒步顶佛山
posts.text:
顶佛山，海拔 1883 米，位于广西资源县银竹老山自然保护区北沿，为湘桂两省三县（资源、城步、新宁）交界之山峰。山名的由来不可考。 在攀登石羊山那次，茶坪村委柳主任告诉我们，通往银竹老山自然保护区的公路已进行过整修，上去比以前方便，于是，便有了这次徒步活动。 2017 年 11 月 1 日，我们驱车从资源县城出发，约二个半小时到达银竹老山自然保护区的双叉河，北行至湘桂两省坳口。补充说一句，在途中发现一树红艳艳的野荔枝（资源土名叫癞头杨梅），食指大动，津涎如线，摘而啖之，呵呵。 因新宁县在顶佛山西北一带修建了风电场，我们徒步便沿着公路迤逦而行。一个多小时便到达顶佛山坳口，眼前巨大的风电机错落而立，天气晴朗，秋风习习，视线毫无阻碍。尖耸的顶佛山顶峰杂树丛生，似乎没什么特点，我们发现北侧的山头怪石嶙峋，兴趣顿生。大概是地表风化的原因，各种奇形怪状的石头裸露在山上，大的有 5-6 米之高。奇石或圆或方，或立或斜，或半卧于土中，或挺立于崖畔，或独自成形，或如刀切成数段，总而言之，那是相当的有特点。我们辗转寻觅，耗时颇多。松荫下，枞树菌时而可见，不免一一收入囊中。站在巨石之上，面对东方，细细分辨曾经留下我们的足迹的锅厂岭、龙头山，心中很是欣慰。 赏石既毕，向西而行。新宁县风电场总部已在眼前，风雨殿（海拨 1855 米）上的巨石也清晰可辨。因一同伴惦记着要到银竹老山横江保护站看看，于是折返。 中国晋代有个雪夜访戴的故事，王 子猷 说：“吾本乘兴而行，兴尽而返，何必见戴？”我等虽非名士，心情则是一样的。西延人记。

posts.author: Nefernefruaton
posts.text:
Уважаемые врачи.
Прошу обратить внимание на мою тему, которую я вынуждена продолжить. Ребенок пропил курс Супракса в прописанной дозировке 6 дней. В процессе лечения была выслушана врачом 30 октября, врач отметил улучшение. Курс антибиотиков окончен 1 ноября. Ребенок чувствует себя прекрасно, ее ничто не беспокоит.
Вчера был сдан клинический анализ крови (результат прилагаю). Он в норме. Сегодня был сделан контрольный снимок (прошло 10 дней после первого снимка). И вот здесь картина не радует...
Прошу ваших рекомендаций по дальнейшим нашим действиям. К врачу на прием идем завтра.
Вопросы:
1. Действительно ли у ребенка все еще пневмония при таком анализе крови, или просто еще рано для контрольного снимка?
2. Показан ли повторный курс антибиотиков?
Заранее спасибо за ответы.

thread.title_full: 【서울=뉴시스】 이진영 기자 = 신한금융투자는 천연가스에 투자하는 레버리지 ETN과 인버스

posts.author: 이진영
posts.title: 【서울=뉴시스】 이진영 기자 = 신한금융투자는 천연가스에 투자하는 레버리지 ETN과 인버스
posts.text:
【서울=뉴시스】 이진영 기자 = 신한금융투자는 천연가스에 투자하는 레버리지 ETN과 인버스 레버리지 ETN을 3일 상장했다고 밝혔다.
이번에 상장된 ETN은 '신한 레버리지 천연가스 선물 ETN(H)'과 '신한 인버스 2X 천연가스 선물 ETN(H)'이다.
신한 레버리지 천연가스 선물 ETN은 뉴욕상품거래소(NYMEX)에서 거래되는 천연가스 선물 일간 수익률의 2배수를 추종하는 상품이다.
'신한 인버스 2X 천연 가스 선물 ETN(H)'은 천연가스 선물 일간 수익률의 -2배수를 추종하는 인버스 레버리지 상품이다.
이번 천연가스 레버리지 상품은 WTI 및 은선물 레버리지 및 인버스 레버리지 상품에 이어 신한금융투자가 발행하는 세 번째 원자재 레버리지 상품이다.
윤채성 신한금융투자 에쿼티파생부 팀장은 "원자재 투자에 대한 관심이 높은 상황에서 천연가스 레버리지 및 인버스 레버리지 상품 등 다양한 상품을 출시할 계획이다"라고 말했다.

thread.title_full: ولي العهد السعودي يتهم إيران بشن “عدوان مباشر” ضد بلاده

posts.author: رداد القرالة
posts.title: ولي العهد السعودي يتهم إيران بشن “عدوان مباشر” ضد بلاده
posts.text:
الرئيسية / عرب وعالم / ولي العهد السعودي يتهم إيران بشن “عدوان مباشر” ضد بلاده ولي العهد السعودي يتهم إيران بشن “عدوان مباشر” ضد بلاده منذ 41 دقيقة عرب وعالم التعليقات على ولي العهد السعودي يتهم إيران بشن “عدوان مباشر” ضد بلاده   
اتهم ولي العهد السعودي الأمير محمد بن سلمان، اليوم الثلاثاء، ايران بتزويد المتمردين الحوثيين في اليمن بالصواريخ، معتبرا ان هذا الامر يمثل “عدوانا عسكريا ومباشرا من النظام الايراني” ضد المملكة. 
واعلنت السعودية السبت ان قواتها اعترضت فوق مطار الرياض صاروخا بالستيا أطلقه المتمردون الحوثيون في اليمن باتجاه العاصمة، ما أدى الى سقوط شظايا منه في حرم المطار، محملة طهران المسؤولية. 
ونقلت وكالة الانباء السعودية الرسمية عن ولي العهد قوله في اتصال هاتفي مع وزير الخارجية البريطاني بوريس جونسون “ان ضلوع النظام الإيراني في تزويد الميليشيات الحوثية التابعة له بالصواريخ يعد عدواناً عسكرياً ومباشراً من قبل النظام الإيراني، وقد يرقى إلى اعتباره عملاً من أعمال الحرب ضد المملكة”. 
وتقود السعودية منذ آذار/مارس 2015 تحالفا عسكريا في اليمن دعما للحكومة المعترف بها وفي مواجهة المتمردين الشيعة المتحالفين مع الرئيس اليمني السابق علي عبدالله صالح. وتتهم ايران بمد الحوثيين بالسلاح، الامر الذي تنفيه طهران التي تؤكد دعمها السياسي للمتمردين.

thread.title: 韩媒：一中国货船在朝鲜半岛西部海域倾斜并无伤亡|仁川|货船|海域_新浪军事_新浪网
thread.title_full: 韩媒：一中国货船在朝鲜半岛西部海域倾斜并无伤亡|仁川|货船|海域_新浪军事_新浪网

posts.author: anonymous
posts.title: 韩媒：一中国货船在朝鲜半岛西部海域倾斜并无伤亡|仁川|货船|海域_新浪军事_新浪网
posts.text:
【环球网报道 记者 李婷婷】据韩联社11月7日报道，7日上午10时52分许，一艘中国货船(5070吨级)在仁川市中区永宗大桥以北0.5公里海域陷入滩涂并向右倾斜，事故没有造成人员伤亡。
事故发生时，船上共载有17名中国籍船员、2名韩籍引航员。由于船身未进水，所幸没有造成人员伤亡。
当天，韩国海警从仁川港水上交通管控中心(VTS)接到船只搁浅的消息后，随即派遣5艘警备舰艇展开救援。仁川海洋警方相关人士表示，正用警备舰艇将船上人员转移至安全区，预计船只偏离航道而陷入滩涂。为防止货船发生燃油泄漏等海洋污染，韩国海警正对事故原因展开调查。
据报道，该货船载有246标箱(TEU)集装箱，5日从天津港出发，计划当天下午从京仁运河仁川客运站进港。

thread.title: ROUNDUP: Toyota legt im ersten Halbjahr zu - Jahresprognose angehoben
thread.title_full: ROUNDUP: Toyota legt im ersten Halbjahr zu - Jahresprognose angehoben

posts.title: ROUNDUP: Toyota legt im ersten Halbjahr zu - Jahresprognose angehoben
posts.text:
TOKIO (dpa-AFX) - Japans größter Autobauer Toyota bekommt deutlich Rückenwind vom schwachen Yen. Der Volkswagen -Rivale hob die Gewinnprognose für das noch bis zum 31. März laufende Geschäftsjahr an und rechnet nun mit 1,95 Billionen Yen (14,7 Mrd Euro) Gewinn statt 1,75 Billionen. Das wäre im Vorjahresvergleich ein Plus von 6,5 Prozent. Dabei hatte der Branchenprimus, zu dem auch die Nutzfahrzeugtochter Hino Motors und der Kleinwagenbauer Daihatsu gehören, anfangs noch mit rückläufigen Erträgen gerechnet. 
An Umsatz im laufenden Geschäftsjahr werden weiterhin 28,5 Billionen Yen erwartet, hieß es. Die Korrektur nach oben habe man größtenteils den Wechselkursbewegungen zu verdanken, erklärte Vizepräsident Osamu Nagata. Ein schwacher Yen verschafft japanischen Unternehmen wie Toyota höhere Exporterlöse. 
In der ersten Hälfte des laufenden Geschäftsjahres verdiente Toyota unter dem Strich 1,07 Billionen Yen (rund 8 Mrd Euro). Das ist ein Zuwachs von 13,2 Prozent zum Vorjahreszeitraum. Dazu trugen auch Kosteneinsparungen bei. Der Umsatz stieg um 8,6 Prozent auf 14,19 Billionen Yen. 
Das operative Ergebnis sank allerdings um 20,3 Milliarden Yen auf 1,09 Billionen Yen. Der Konzern begründete dies mit gestiegenen Ausgaben, unter anderem für Werbemaßnahmen. Insgesamt setzte Toyota in den Monaten April bis September rund 4,4 Millionen Fahrzeuge ab, das sind rund 26 000 Fahrzeuge mehr als im Vorjahreszeitraum. 
Bezogen auf das zweite Geschäftsquartal verdiente Toyota unter dem Strich 458,3 Milliarden Yen, 16,4 Prozent mehr als im Vorjahresquartal. Der Umsatz stieg um 10,2 Prozent auf 7,1 Billionen Yen. 
Vizepräsident Nagata zufolge bleibt die Lage auf dem wichtigen US-Markt weiter schwierig. Der Trend gehe dort von Pkw zu leichten Trucks. In der ersten Hälfte des laufenden Geschäftsjahres verkaufte Toyota in Nordamerika rund 1,4 Millionen Fahrzeuge, rund 4200 weniger als im Vorjahreszeitraum./ln/DP/jha ISIN DE0007664039 JP3633400001

posts.title: 1.1 مليار دينار طارت من البورصة في يومين
posts.text:
بورصة الكويت.. الخاسر الأكبر خليجياً بـ 46 نقطة لـ «كويت 15» بـ 4.7% عمليات بيع على الأسهم القيادية.. و5 منها استحوذت على 68% من السيولة 
شريف حمدي 
وسط استمرار موجة بيع قوية تضرب أسواق الخليج، استمر جنوح مؤشرات هذه الأسواق للتراجع باستثناء سوق مسقط الذي يغرد خارج السرب بتحقيق أرباح على مدار الجلستين الماضيتين. 
وتأتي هذه التراجعات الحادة في ظل مخاوف من عمليات بيع عشوائية يقوم بها المستثمرون الأجانب على وقــع التطورات السياسية الأخيرة التي شهدتها المملكة العربية السعودية. 
ويعد سوق الكويت المالي الخاسر الأكبر خليجيا على مدار الجلستين الأخيرتين، حيث طارت من البورصة الكويتية نحو 1.1 مليار دينار (3.6 مليارات دولار)، إذ خسر السوق في جلسة الأحد 350 مليون دينار، وفي جلسة أمس تضاعفت الخسائر لتصل إلى 788 مليون دينار. 
واستقرت القيمة الرأسمالية للبورصة بعد تعاملات أمس عند 27.285 مليار دينار لتتقلص مكاسب السوق الرأسمالية إلى 4.5% منذ بداية العام الحالي، بعد أن تخطت 12% خلال العام. 
أما مؤشر كويت 15، وهو المؤشر الأهم للتعبير عن أداء بورصة الكويت بواقعية كونه المؤشر الذي يقيس أداء أكبر 15 شركة كويتية مدرجة من حيث السيولة والقيمة الرأسمالية، فكــان قد تعرض لخسائر كبيرة علــى مدار اليومين بإجمالــي 46 نقطة بنسبة 4.7% ليهــوي المؤشر إلى 918 نقطة، فيمـــا خسر المؤشـر الوزني 16.7 نقطة بنسبة 4% ليهوي إلى 402 نقطة. 
وخسر المؤشر السعري 3.5% في الجلستين الأخيرتين بعد ان تراجع إلى 6319 نقطة خاسرا 230 نقطة. 
وشهدت السيولة ارتفاعا بنسبة 60% في جلسة أمس مقارنة بالجلسة التي سبقتها، إذ بلغـــت 28 مليون دينار ارتفاعا من 17.5 مليونا أول من أمس، واستحوذت 5 أسهم هـــي «بيتك» و«الوطني» و«زيــن» و«اجيليتي» و«الامتياز» على 68% مــن السيولة بنحو 19 مليون دينار. 
خليجيا، استمر تراجع الأسواق على النحو التالي: خسر سوق تاسي (السوق السعودي) 0.5% ، كما خسر سوق دبي 1.2%، وسوق ابوظبي 0.4%، وسوق قطر 1.4%، وخسر سوق البحرين 0.9%، فيما حقق سوق مسقط 0.5% مكاسب. أضف تعليق

posts.title: IELTS获得美国公民与移民局的认可
posts.text:
美国国土安全部下属的美国公民与移民局（USCIS）最近在其网站上为想取得卫生护理工作人员证书的人列出了IELTS分数的要求，这对于那些想移民美国并取得公民身份的人来说是一个很大的举措。
USCIS负责管理移民与归化工作以及制定移民服务的政策及工作重点。USCIS网站可为那些想去美国工作或取得美国公民身份的人提供参考信息。IELTS成绩如今成为卫生护理工作人员证书的一部分，可以证明外国的卫生护理工作人员达到了完成其职业任务所必需的最低限度的英语语言能力。
卫生护理工作人员包括获得执照的注册护士、获得执照的实习护士和职业护士、语言障碍矫正师、听力专家、医学专家（临床实验室科学家）、医师助理以及医学技师（临床实验室技师）。IELTS成绩早就被澳大利亚、加拿大、英国及新西兰政府用于移民事务。
美国政府对IELTS的承认强调了这样一个事实：IELTS是世界上发展最快的英语语言能力测试，每年有50余万人参加该考试。IELTS获得了国际的认可，由设在113个国家的304个考试中心进行组织。http://www.ielts.org 。
USCIS网站列出了看护与卫生护理工作人员所需的IELTS分数。比如 获得执照的注册护士须要参加学术类的IELTS考试并取得6.5分的总分，口语成绩最少得是7.0分。除获得执照的注册护士以外的卫生护理工作人员不需要有学士学位，但是必须获得学术类或培训类考试6.0分的总分及7.0分的口语分数。
（链接 http://uscis.gov/graphics/howdoi/health_cert.htm）
最近美国的主要教育权力机关及院校认可了IELTS，这也为政府接受IELTS，以及USCIS在网站上列出IELTS成绩要求提供了支持。
最近一些新的大学声明接受IELTS成绩，这使得承认IELTS的美国院校达到了694所，其中包括8所“常春藤联盟”大学中的7所。 e¤B|Ïnõbbs.chuguo.cnë(4/Ý-:

posts.title: Bristol Water director Mick Axtell to resign
posts.text: Bristol Water director Mick Axtell to resign Staff Writer | Bristol, United Kingdom | Tuesday November 7, 2017 | 11 minutes ago Bristol Water, a water services company, confirmed that Mick Axtell has tendered his resignation as an executive director. Mr. Axtell was appointed to the Board on 30 January 2014. Article continues below He joined the Company in September 2013 as Deputy Finance Director, was appointed Finance Director in January 2014 and became CFO in November 2015 and now manages the Corporate Services Directorate (CSD). Mr. Axtell served as Interim CEO. Prior to joining the Mr. Axtell he held a number of senior Finance roles at RWE, one of Europe’s leading electricity and gas companies. ■ LATEST MOVES FROM United Kingdom
